name: HelpingHand
0:
”Alexa open helping Hand”
”Alexa ask helping hand next”
”Alexa ask helping hand yes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: helping hand
des:
This skill helps you learn about the services offered by your outsourcing partner Helping Hand India. It informs about various services provided by Helping Hand India and why you must choose Helping Hand India as your outsourcing partner.

To start say Open Helping Hand, to stop say stop.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
